name: PHContentEditingController
desc: A protocol your custom view controller class implements to provide a user interface for your Photos extension.

items.name: func canHandle(PHAdjustmentData) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks your extension whether it can continue working with the most recent edit that was made to an asset.

items.name: func startContentEditing(with: PHContentEditingInput, placeholderImage: UIImage)
items.desc: Tells your extension that asset data is available for editing.

items.name: func finishContentEditing(completionHandler: (PHContentEditingOutput?) -> Void)
items.desc: Asks your extension for edited asset data to finish the editing session.

items.name: var shouldShowCancelConfirmation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether Photos should prompt the user when canceling the editing session.

items.name: func cancelContentEditing()
items.desc: Tells your extension to cancel editing.
